product_overview: Manager App is a full-stack web application designed to provide comprehensive management capabilities including user authentication, dashboard analytics, inventory, pharmacy, product, and investment management, all built with modern technologies for an efficient and responsive user experience.
core_goals: Enable secure user authentication and access control.
Provide a centralized dashboard for analytics and management views.
Facilitate inventory and product management operations.
Manage pharmacy-specific workflows and data efficiently.
Ensure a smooth user experience with modular, reusable UI components.
key_features: User Authentication system for secure login and session management.
Dashboard that consolidates analytics, logging, and management functionalities.
Inventory and Product Management modules to handle stock and catalog data.
Pharmacy Management features tailored for pharmacy operations.
OCR functionality page for text recognition tasks.
Reusable UI components like modals, form fields, and menus for consistent UI/UX.
API service layer for backend communication and data handling.
user_flow_summary: User accesses the login page and authenticates via the authentication system.
Upon successful login, user is directed to the main dashboard.
User navigates through dashboard analytics, inventory, products, pharmacy, and investment management pages.
User performs CRUD operations on Inventory, Products, and Pharmacy data via modals.
Investments page provides management tools specific to investments.
OCR page allows users to perform text recognition and related operations.
Throughout the app, consistent layout and navigation structure guide user interactions.
validation_criteria: Successful user login and logout flows with proper session management.
Dashboard displays accurate and up-to-date analytics data.
Inventory and products are created, read, updated, and deleted correctly.
Pharmacy-related operations execute as expected without errors.
Investment data is managed correctly and displayed in the investment views.
OCR functionality yields correct text recognition results.
UI components behave consistently across different pages and screen sizes.
API services handle requests and responses reliably and securely.
